diergo.spring.legacy

Class LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • diergo.spring.legacy.AbstractRegistryPostProcessor
      • diergo.spring.legacy.LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aware, BeanFactoryPostProcessor, BeanDefinitionRegistryPostProcessor, EnvironmentAware, Ordered, PriorityOrdered

    class LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessor
extends AbstractRegistryPostProcessor
    A post processor registering all legacy singletons as spring beans.
    See Also:
    LegacyBeanRegistryPostProcessorBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • postProcess

        protected void postProcess(BeanDefinitionRegistry registry)
        Creates a ClassPathBeanDefinitionScanner with all type filters configured, scans the base packages and register bean definitions created. Afterwards register bean definitions created from factories configured.
        Specified by:
        postProcess in class AbstractRegistryPostProcessor
